entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [RuntimeAsync] Problem with boxing in resume stub when return type is a struct instantiated over object type #3010

PullRequests

Created

  • [Swift ABI compatibility] Functional tests for `InitWithCopy` and `Destroy` functions in value witness table #3009
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [Swift ABI compatibility] Document memory ownership and handling at the Swift–C# boundary #3008
    area-SwiftBindings

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Remove various file reading (Linux specific) paths #2952
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Merge feb25 #2993
  • [Swift shipping] Setup MacCatalyst tests on the CI #2998
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [Swift language features] Implement `Foundation.Data` wrapper for the `CryptoKit` in C# #3000
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [Swift Bindings] Initialize bound generics handling #3003
    area-SwiftBindings
  • Implement a change in IL API to use RuntimeHelpers.Await<T>(Task<T>) and similar helpers. #2951
